TextLibrary.Text: You have not beaten the Ogre, but you may try again.
You have not beaten the second Ogre, but you may try again.
There are a large number of Ogres here and they appear to be hostile.
You must travel south to Gork and try to settle down the Ogres.
The Ogres are still restless, you will need to teach them another lesson.
Khrona is grateful for your help in driving the Ogres back into the south.
You have defeated one of the Ogres, but the rest seem to be ignoring you.
Defeating a second Ogre seems to have quietened them down a little.
This Ogre is wearing a huge Horned Helm and Chain Armor to protect him.
